content: B36 2.6 36V Battery High-power 36V 2.6 Ah Li-ion battery ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Batteries, chargers, and power stations- - - ### FEATURES:Features More compact, lightweight high-capacity battery providing the run time needed for demanding applications Includes Hilti Cordless Power Care (CPC) technology – on-board processors monitor each battery cell to deliver more reliable, consistent and longer-lasting power on your jobsites Fully sealed electronics for increased protection against dust, humidity and water Rubberized, glass-fiber reinforced casing – up to four times more resistant to damage from dropping and twice as resistant to extreme temperatures than standard ABS plastic Casing designed to cool the battery to the ideal temperature for faster charging Applications Compatible with most Hilti 36V tools Compatible with all Hilti 22V and 36V chargers Applications in extreme temperature conditions – from 60° C (140° F) down to -17° C (1.4° F) Tough jobs requiring maximum performance and battery capacity for extended run-time ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight: 780 Dimensions (LxWxH): 6.6 x 3.6 x 2.4 in Working temperature range: 1 - 140 °F Technical Data | Weight | 780 | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 6.6 x 3.6 x 2.4 in ### ITEMS- 2098208 - Battery pack B 36/2.6 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x B 36/2.6 Battery pack
